Description: Guitar is Beautiful.......Very good condition for age normal wear & imperfections Guitar is SOLID!!!!...Woods that are in Guitar are Rich in Grain....Notice the Two Emblems....Smooth to touch they seem to be made by Factory...no wood damage in grain see photo...Might have been made for Celebrity.....Under the Serial number(895198) is the no. #2 stamped...........Deluxe Pearl Tuning gear look Great...Everything on guitar is orig including bone on bridge....Action/intonation/string height is as good as it gets perfect for a player like Earl Klugh!!!!....From a family estate I was able to find year by Serial Number on Gibson site.....In fact Guitar is Ref under Epiphone/Gibson -Serial number system(2018 Price Guide Vintage Guitar)...Union Made Label Authentic in Excellent condition.....Heavy Duty Plush lines Case is Nice....Has some wear but over all NICE...Latches work great & Handle....Case is slightly bigger for guitar, however guitar lies perfectly Flat closes nicely!!!!..Please ask questions if you need to BEFORE BUYING GUITAR THANKS...CHECK OUT MY OTHER VINTAGE STRING INSTRUMENTS.
Title: Rare 1962 Gibson/Epiphone EC-300 Barcelone Classical Guitar
ConditionDescription: VERY GOOD CONDITION for age well taken care of.
